QuestData.Title: Voras, The Realm Eater
QuestData.Description:
We have everything we need, $n. Now only the kill remains.
We set the lure, weaken the beast, and land the final blow.
Hunting is a battle of wills. Life or death hangs in the balance for all of us. It has always been this way, on Azeroth as in Ardenweald.
Let the hunt begin.
QuestData.RewardText: The hunt is over. We have prevailed.
